Personal Information

  • Born June 30, 1985 (40 years)
  • Birthplace Marietta, Georgia
  • Debut June 16, 2006
  • Finishers Cross Rhodes, Cody Cutter

Family

  • Father Dusty Rhodes

Social Media

Biography

Cody Garrett Runnels Rhodes was born in Marietta, Georgia on June 30, 1985. He is the son of WWE Hall of Famer Dusty Rhodes and the half-brother of Dustin Rhodes (formerly known as Goldust in WWE).

Cody began his wrestling career in 2006 in Ohio Valley Wrestling (OVW), WWE's developmental territory at the time. He made his main roster debut in 2007 and spent nearly a decade with the company, holding multiple championships including the Intercontinental Championship and various tag team titles.

After leaving WWE in 2016, Rhodes became one of the most influential figures in professional wrestling, competing in promotions like Ring of Honor, New Japan Pro Wrestling, and helping to found All Elite Wrestling (AEW) where he served as an Executive Vice President.

In 2022, Rhodes made a shocking return to WWE at WrestleMania 38, establishing himself as one of the company's top stars. His journey culminated at WrestleMania XL in 2024, where he defeated Roman Reigns to win the Undisputed WWE Championship, fulfilling his family's legacy.

Currently, Rhodes is in his second reign as WWE Champion after recapturing the title at SummerSlam 2025. He is recognized as one of the top stars in WWE and continues to be one of the most popular superstars on the roster.

Championship History

WWE Championship (2 times, current)
AEW TNT Championship (3 times)
ROH World Championship (1 time)
NWA Worlds Heavyweight Championship (1 time)

Other Championships

WWE Intercontinental Championship (2 times)
WWE Raw Tag Team Championship (4 times)
WWE SmackDown Tag Team Championship (1 time)
World Tag Team Championship (3 times)

Accomplishments

  • WWE Triple Crown Champion
  • WWE King of the Ring (2025)
  • WWE Men's Royal Rumble Winner (2023, 2024)
  • WWE Crown Jewel Championship (2024)
  • WWE Slammy Award - Male Superstar of the Year (2024, 2025)
  • WWE Slammy Award - Match of the Year (2025 - vs. Roman Reigns at WrestleMania XL)
  • WWE Slammy Award - Rivalry of the Year (2024 - vs. Roman Reigns)
  • PWI Wrestler of the Year (2024)
  • PWI Match of the Year (2024 - vs. Roman Reigns at WrestleMania XL)
  • PWI Most Popular Wrestler of the Year (2023, 2024)
  • Ranked #1 in PWI 500 (2024, 2025)

Career Highlights

August 2025

SummerSlam 2025

Defeated Roman Reigns to win the WWE Championship in the main event of SummerSlam 2025 in East Rutherford, NJ.

April 2024

WrestleMania XL

Defeated Roman Reigns to win the Undisputed WWE Championship in the main event of WrestleMania XL, fulfilling his family's legacy.

January 2024

Royal Rumble 2024

Won the Men's Royal Rumble match for the second consecutive year, entering at #15 and eliminating Gunther last.

April 2022

WWE Return

Made a shocking return to WWE at WrestleMania 38, defeating Seth Rollins in a surprise match.

January 2019

All Elite Wrestling

Helped found All Elite Wrestling (AEW) and became an Executive Vice President of the company.

May 2016

WWE Departure

Left WWE to pursue opportunities on the independent circuit.

July 2007

WWE Main Roster Debut

Made his WWE main roster debut on Raw.
